page.title: 04GREAT OAKLEY CofE SCHOOL .
page.content: There are 65 children at our school. They start their{education}at 5 and leave to go to{Tendring High school when they are 11 years old. There are 3 teachers: Mrs. Turnbull teaches the Infants,Mr Nicholls is the{Deputy {Head,}he teaches class 2, Mr.Ling is the{Headmaster}and he teaches class 1. School starts at quarter past nine and ends at half past three.School dinners cost 63 pence. In 1984 we bought our first{computer}it cost Â£400 pounds and the disc drive cost Â£80 pounds our computer is a BBC,B.We have a netball team, football team and we play rounders and cricket. At school we have a{conservation area}with a pond. It was built in 1984. There are some frogs and tadpoles. The pond is 86cm deep but is shallower in some places.
